en.title: Login
en.disclaimer: ‚ö†Ô∏è This extension analyzes visible messages on social networks to identify potentially inappropriate content, using the Perspective API developed by Google. No personal data is stored or shared for commercial purposes.
en.consentGiven: I consent to my messages being analyzed locally and temporarily transmitted to the Perspective API solely for the purpose of evaluating their toxicity level.
en.toxicityThresholdLabel: Set toxicity threshold (% sensitivity to alert):
en.extensionDisclaimer: This extension is provided for preventive purposes. Its author cannot be held responsible for the consequences related to its use, operation, or any detections.
en.questionAnswerRequired: ‚ö†Ô∏è The secret question and answer must be provided.
en.passwordRequirements: ‚ö†Ô∏è The password must contain at least 6 characters, including 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter, and 1 special character.
en.invalidDomain: ‚ö†Ô∏è Please enter a valid domain (e.g., www.example.com)
en.noSecretQuestion: ‚ö†Ô∏è No secret question has been defined.
en.correctAnswer: ‚úÖ Correct answer! You can now change the password.
en.notificationMessage: You have been logged out after 2 minutes of inactivity.
en.autoBlockedSiteMessage: You do not have access to this site
en.cyberbullyingAlertMessage: Your message has a toxicity score of {score}%. It will be removed as it could be interpreted as a form of cyberbullying.
en.cyberbullyingAlertRemainingAttempts: You have {attempts} attempt{plural} left before blocking.
